add_subdirectory(dataset)
add_subdirectory(framework)
add_subdirectory(dataset_impl)
add_subdirectory(py_interface)
if (INTERNAL_VERSION)
    if (_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI EQUAL 0)
        add_subdirectory(odps)
    else()
        add_subdirectory(open_storage)
    endif()
    add_subdirectory(lake)
endif(INTERNAL_VERSION)
